scripts.gitpod-prepare: npm run git-shh-to-https && (yes | sudo apt install screen) && (yes | sudo apt install rsync) && (yes | sudo apt install net-tools) && screen -S docker -d -m sudo docker-up
scripts.packages-ci: (cd packages && for d in */; do (cd $d && npm ci); done)
scripts.deeplinks-app-build-core: cd packages/deeplinks-app && npm run build && npm run export
scripts.local: cross-env npm_config_yes=true MIGRATIONS_ID_TYPE_SQL=bigint MIGRATIONS_ID_TYPE_GQL=bigint MIGRATIONS_HASURA_PATH=localhost:8080 MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SSL=0 MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SECRET=myadminsecretkey NEXT_PUBLIC_DEEPLINKS_SERVER=http://localhost:3007 NEXT_PUBLIC_HASURA_PATH=localhost:8080 NEXT_PUBLIC_HASURA_SSL=0 HASURA_PATH=localhost:8080 HASURA_SSL=0 MIGRATIONS_DEEPLINKS_APP_URL=localhost:3007 npm run local-core
scripts.electron-dev: (cross-env npm_config_yes=true MIGRATIONS_ID_TYPE_SQL=bigint MIGRATIONS_ID_TYPE_GQL=bigint MIGRATIONS_HASURA_PATH=localhost:8080 MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SSL=0 MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SECRET=myadminsecretkey NEXT_PUBLIC_DEEPLINKS_SERVER=http://localhost:3007 NEXT_PUBLIC_HASURA_PATH=localhost:8080 NEXT_PUBLIC_HASURA_SSL=0 HASURA_PATH=localhost:8080 HASURA_SSL=0 MIGRATIONS_DEEPLINKS_APP_URL=localhost:3007 npm run electron-dev-core)
scripts.electron-dev-core: npm ci && npm run deeplinks-app-build && npm run deeplinks-app-electron
scripts.electron-build: (cross-env npm_config_yes=true MIGRATIONS_ID_TYPE_SQL=bigint MIGRATIONS_ID_TYPE_GQL=bigint MIGRATIONS_HASURA_PATH=localhost:8080 MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SSL=0 MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SECRET=myadminsecretkey NEXT_PUBLIC_DEEPLINKS_SERVER=http://localhost:3007 NEXT_PUBLIC_HASURA_PATH=localhost:8080 NEXT_PUBLIC_HASURA_SSL=0 HASURA_PATH=localhost:8080 HASURA_SSL=0 MIGRATIONS_DEEPLINKS_APP_URL=localhost:3007 npm run electron-build-core)
scripts.electron-build-core: npm ci && (cd packages/deeplinks-app && npm run electron-build)
scripts.gitpod: cross-env npm_config_yes=true MIGRATIONS_ID_TYPE_SQL=bigint MIGRATIONS_ID_TYPE_GQL=bigint MIGRATIONS_HASURA_PATH=$(echo $(gp url 8080) | awk -F[/:] '{print $4}') MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SSL=1 MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SECRET=myadminsecretkey NEXT_PUBLIC_DEEPLINKS_SERVER=https://$(echo $(gp url 3007) | awk -F[/:] '{print $4}') NEXT_PUBLIC_HASURA_PATH=$(echo $(gp url 8080) | awk -F[/:] '{print $4}') NEXT_PUBLIC_HASURA_SSL=1 HASURA_PATH=$(echo $(gp url 8080) | awk -F[/:] '{print $4}') HASURA_SSL=1 MIGRATIONS_DEEPLINKS_APP_URL=$(gp url 3007) npm run gitpod-core
scripts.gitpod-core: npm run gitpod-prepare && npm ci && npm run deeplinks-app
scripts.git-shh-to-https: git config --global url."https://".insteadOf git:// && git config --global url."https://github.com/".insteadOf ssh://git@github.com/
